episodes.title: The End & the Beginning
episodes.plot: Hinata is inspired by the Small Giant playing volleyball on TV. Three years later, he goes to his first-ever volleyball tournament with his team and is set to play against the school of Kageyama Tobio, also known as the King of the Court.

episodes.title: Karasuno High School Volleyball Club
episodes.plot: After just joining the Karasuno Volleyball team, Hinata is faced with a new obstacle. His middle school rival, Kageyama, is also a potential member of the team. When the disapproving captain arrives, he quickly kicks them out until they can get along.

episodes.title: The Formidable Ally
episodes.plot: With sophomore Tanaka on their side, Hinata and Kageyama are up against freshmen Tsukishima and Yamaguchi and third-year team-captain Sawamura in a three-on-three match.

episodes.title: The View from the Summit
episodes.plot: Kageyama and Hinata both win their places on the team. But when the team's new coach, Ittetsu Takeda arrives, his announcement of a practice match with one of the top volleyball teams in the prefecture has both of them scrambling.

episodes.title: A Coward's Anxiety
episodes.plot: After the 3 vs 3, the first years are welcomed into the club as full members just in time for a practice match with Aoba Johsai. Will Hinata be able to handle the pressure of his first real match?

episodes.title: An Interesting Team
episodes.plot: Hinata and Kageyama are in full form, and it looks like victory is inevitable. But when Seijoh's captain Oikawa returns to the court, will Karasuno be able to fend off his super serves?

episodes.title: Versus the Great King
episodes.plot: Sophomore Nishinoya, the "Guardian God" of Karasuno Volleyball Club, returns to rally the other club-members during practice. Meanwhile, Takeda is still pulling for Keishin Ukai to be the next coach of Karasuno High-and he has a plan that just might work.

episodes.title: He Who Is Called "Ace"
episodes.plot: With the match against Nekoma looming, temp coach Ukai arranges an exhibition against his local volleyball association ... and now Azumane must prove he deserves his title.

episodes.title: A Toss to the Ace
episodes.plot: It's time for the Karasu versus Neighborhood Association team practice-match, where Asahi lives up to his title. With Hinata in pure awe of Asahi's gameplay, Kageyama makes moves to get Hinata back on track.

episodes.title: Yearning
episodes.plot: Gearing up for their match against Nekoma (and for the Inter-High preliminaries), the Karasuno team heads to training camp. But even with their much-improved skills, Keishin must make a difficult choice for setter: Kageyama or Sugawara.

episodes.title: Decision
episodes.plot: With the practice match against Nekoma fully underway, Karasuno seems to be the team to beat-thanks to the fearsome power of the Hinata-Kageyama duo. But Nekoma devises a clever and unexpected plan to reverse their losing streak...

episodes.title: The Neko-Karasu Reunion
episodes.plot: In an epic showdown, Nekoma and Karasuno battle it out for the win. Though Karasuno suffer a close defeat, the resulting alliance the two teams form could lead them to victory at the Nationals.

episodes.title: Rival
episodes.plot: With the Inter-High finals fast approaching, the pairings of the preliminaries are announced, and the tension is mounting amongst the members of Karasuno volleyball club. ?Meanwhile, not to be left out, Yamaguchi is secretly working on mastering his unique jump float serve.

episodes.title: Formidable Opponents
episodes.plot: Karasuno's first match at the long-awaited Inter-High preliminaries is against Tokonami High School. With Karasuno leading 3-0, it's becoming clear that Karasuno is back in action-and better than ever!

episodes.title: Revival
episodes.plot: While Karasuno seems to be winning against Tokonami, the outclassed team are determined to turn things around. Meanwhile, on the other court, the Karasuno girls' team isn't doing nearly as well...

episodes.title: Winners and Losers
episodes.plot: With the second match underway-this time between Karasuno and Dateko-Dateko's best tactic is their killer serves. Karasuno do their best to counter their serves, until pulling out their last ace: their own version of Nekoma's tactic "Pipe".

episodes.title: The Iron Wall
episodes.plot: With Hinata and Kageyama's clever moves, Karasuno is now in the lead against Dateko. But with Aone blocking, Dateko seems poised to flip the script. Now it's up to ace Azumane to show his skills, and break through Detoko's "Iron Wall".

episodes.title: Guarding Your Back
episodes.plot: The match vs Date Tech continues - neither team managing to gain a decisive lead. As the match nears it's end, Asahi steps up as Karasuno's Ace. Will he finally gain his revenge?

episodes.title: Conductors
episodes.plot: It's a head-to-head match between Oikawa and Kageyama, and it shows no signs of letting up. It turns out their competitive duel goes way back. During the match, Aoba Johsai pulls a tactic that threatens to send Kageyama into "King Mode".

episodes.title: Oikawa Toru is not a Genius
episodes.plot: Switching things up, Sugawara replaces Kageyama, giving the first win to team Aoba Johsai. But during the second match, Karasuno takes the lead ... until Oikawa's predictions start coming true.

episodes.title: Senpai's True Abilities
episodes.plot: Sugawara takes the court and throws off Aoba Johsai's rhythm. This gives Kageyama a chance to watch his senior in action.

episodes.title: Evolution
episodes.plot: After a grueling loss of the first set to Aoba Johsai, Karasuno is as determined as ever to win the second set and hang onto their chance to make it in the preliminaries.

episodes.title: The Point That Changes the Momentum
episodes.plot: Karasuno plays the third set against Aoba Johsai, fighting to move on in the spring preliminaries

episodes.title: Removing the "Solitary King"
episodes.plot: Karasuna and Seijoh are 24-24 in the third set and the rallies are getting longer and longer.

episodes.title: The Third Day
episodes.plot: The third year students have a tough choice to make as the entire team recovers from the tournament.

episodes.title: OVA: The Arrival of Haiba Lev
episodes.plot: The newest Nekoma team member arrives.
